mapper.insert: insert into emp (EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO) VALUES (#{empno},#{ename},#{job},#{mgr},#{hiredate},#{sal},#{comm},#{deptno})
mapper.update: update emp set ENAME=#{ename}, JOB=#{job}, MGR=#{mgr}, HIREDATE=#{hiredate}, SAL=#{sal}, COMM=#{comm}, DEPTNO=#{deptno} where EMPNO=#{empno}
mapper.select: select empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno from emp
